ComicInfo.Summary:
The world’s most famous detective meets the world’s most famous magician... and death ensues! Famed detective Sherlock Holmes and brash showman Harry Houdini must combine forces to defeat a mysterious mystic dedicated to destroying Houdini’s career and killing anyone who gets in his way. A new five-issue series by Anthony Del Sol and Conor McCreery, the Harvey Award-nominated creators of Kill Shakespeare.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | John Cassaday | 1 | A | Variant Cover A | Aaron Campbell | 2 | B | Variant Cover B | Colton Worley | 3 | RE | Retailer Exclusive "Virgin Art" Cover - New York City Comic Con | John Cassaday | 4 | RI | Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | John Cassaday | 5 |

ComicInfo.Editor: Hannah Gorfinkel Elder, Joseph Rybandt, Molly Mahan
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Watson, Harry Houdini, Inspector Lestrade, Sherlock Holmes
